body_html:
After some trial and error, adding a dtype=tf.float32 seems to have fixed it

request.inputs['images'].CopyFrom(
          tf.contrib.util.make_tensor_proto(image[0], shape=[1,1,20], dtype=tf.float32))
body_text:
After some trial and error, adding a dtype=tf.float32 seems to have fixed it
request.inputs['images'].CopyFrom(
          tf.contrib.util.make_tensor_proto(image[0], shape=[1,1,20], dtype=tf.float32))
body:
After some trial and error, adding a dtype=tf.float32 seems to have fixed it

```
request.inputs['images'].CopyFrom(
          tf.contrib.util.make_tensor_proto(image[0], shape=[1,1,20], dtype=tf.float32))
```
